#summary Introduction in Exeption Diagnostic.

= Introduction =

This library allow to use simple cpp-constructions to diagnistic different exception crashes in future.

It's only C++ tool.

= Details =

So far application work fine this wrappers don't active. However, if application or sublibrary throw exception, and application catch this, library tools allow to get all diagnistic information about objects which had been destroyed.

Like stack trace it's the instance trace of failure.

Library provide special easy-using tools of this funtionality.

Look to the [QuickGeneralDescription Quick General Description]. This page show general features quick and graphically.

The next guide page [ExampleOfAdvantages Example Of Advantages] can help quick and completely understand usefulness of the library.

Besides, samples are present (see [http://code.google.com/p/exception-diagnostic/source/browse/ subversion trunk/tags]).

== Compile ==

Library has been compiled and built on different operating systems. 

It has been testing with Microsoft Visual C++ 7.0 and GCC compilers.

== Features ==

All types of instances can be wrapped and diagnosed by library.

Diagnostic result can be sent to any std::ostream instance.

Cross-compile.

Minimal syntax and run-time resource using.
